p: A total of 361 QX sequences were included in the final dataset. Of those, 135 belonged to “Company A” and 226 to “Company B”. The sampled farm location is reported in Fig. 1. Overall, farms were mainly located in the “Pianura Padana” region (central area of Northern Italy) and, to a lesser extent, in North-Eastern, North-Western, Central and Southern Italy. Although the two companies tend to operate in different Italian regions, a clear overlapping was present in the high densely populated poultry area of Northern Italy (Fig. 1).
